trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files or folders through a **File** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 控制通过“文件”对话框访问文件或文件夹的能力。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This permission is typically used to provide limited access to user-specified files when <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> is not granted.
trans-unit.target: 此权限通常用于提供有限访问权限时，为用户指定文件<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>未被授予。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> class with the specified access.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的访问权限初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> 值的有效组合。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values (<see langword="Unrestricted" /> or <see langword="None" />).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值之一（<see langword="Unrestricted" /> 或 <see langword="None" />）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> class with either restricted or unrestricted permission, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的受限制或无限制的权限初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to **File** dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 创建完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`访问**文件**对话框。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permitted access to files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对文件的允许访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The permitted access to files.
trans-unit.target: 对文件的允许访问权限。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the <paramref name="access" /> parameter to a value that is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 试图将 <paramref name="access" /> 参数设置为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> 值的非有效组合的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 当前权限的副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding used to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造权限的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数不是有效的权限元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The version number of the <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持 <paramref name="esd" /> 参数的版本号。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限指定一组完全包含在指定权限的操作，当前权限是指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess.Open> access is a subset of a permission for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess.OpenSave> access.
trans-unit.target: 例如，权限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess.Open>访问是有关权限的子集<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess.OpenSave>访问。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建权限及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including state information.
trans-unit.target: 权限及状态信息的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 与当前权限合并的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 对的调用结果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission.Union%2A>是由当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。
